game.name: 星渊勇者 StarAbyss Heroes
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, RPG, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.shortDescription: Torn by an ancient cataclysm, the world lies in ruins. In this ARPG, play a hero exploring relics, looting treasures, forging weapons, and mastering skills on a decaying yet fantastical journey.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Torn by an ancient cataclysm, the world lies in ruins. In this ARPG, play a hero exploring relics, looting treasures, forging weapons, and mastering skills on a decaying yet fantastical journey.
